page.title: 19Newcastle Western By-Pass
page.content: Fifty years ago,a corridor of land was left clear for future development as a road.Next year,this long awaited by-pass will start to be constructed. It will pass near Broadwood Junior School.The road is needed to take all the heavy traffic off Denton Rd..On 5.6.85 between 9.30a.m.and 10a.m. we took a traffic count at Denton Road roundabout. Many pedestrians had a |LORRIES 100| difficult and dangerous |CARS 295| task to cross the road. |VANS 72| The final route to be |BUSSES 11| taken is longer than at |MOTORBIKE 1| first planned. A new |BICYCLE 1| bridge will be built at |============ Scotswood specially designed for heavy traffic. People in the area were consuted about what was going to happen. A Department of Transport spokesman said a questionnaire and map was sent to
